title: Anh đánh rơi người yêu này (English version)
lyrics: Tone Hey baby~ You have dropped this lover I don't know if i'll see you again So it's time (to) fall in love with you Every bit of shy that lingers How can i call you? Let me acquaint you Hope we can go back together Then we come closer step by step Don't see any unfamiliar (Be) cause the moment when i saw you I'm in love with you~
